title: [CLIENT] Wrong selection quotes for reworked champions.
body:
Whenever I choose Poppy {{champion:78}} , Taric {{champion:44}}  or Ryze {{champion:13}} in champion select, they consistently play their selection quotes from** before **their VGUs. This has happened every time I choose them, across several different game modes.
Notably, these are the champs who have been updated since I installed League. Older ones like Sion and Tristana play the correct quotes.
Clearly, its not a game-breaking issue, but it's still irritating.

replies.body: Hey Epicurus - thanks for taking the time to report this! :) Lemme take a look and see what's going on here.
